reviews.review_msg: Catherine is an absolutely wonderful professor. Her lectures are not only tailored to the class interests but also very engaging (she's very funny). I wish I had taken this course before I lived in France because it was so informative. She is always available to help her students, truly cares and is open to feedback. Catherine is a real gem!

A hilarious professor that loves vocab! Professor Black is hilarious, makes class fun and loves to make jokes. She cares a lot about her students and gives great feedback. The class is 80% homework (exercises, reformulations of texts) and 20% for the final exam. If you invest a lot of time in the homework it is pretty easy to get a good grade!

I agree with everyone, she is an amazing prof, but is a very hard marker. Sometimes her sarcasm comes off rude, but overall she's pretty good. Very sassy and funny. Her enthusiasm and passion shows in her teaching and makes you enjoy learning. Overall, she is a character and I enjoyed her class and wouldn't have enjoyed it with another prof.

Can be very anal when it comes to marking  she marks a response as correct on the worksheets, but then proceeds to put the exact same question on the exam and if you put the same answer, it's incorrect. It's very 'my way or the highway' with her. She can be funny and sassy, for sure, but sometimes it comes across as rude and unprofessional.
Hilarious. Amazing teacher. Fair marker. Hilarious.
